The Wanagon

02 June 2015 on Wagon

Why call it a Wanagon? Well, we both wanted a Vanagon, but they cost a lot of money, that we'd rather spend traveling around.

So doing the best we could, we put together the Wanagon, a beautiful blue 1996 Subaru Outback.

Specs

  • 186,000 miles, (Just getting broken in for a Subaru)
  • 45 watts of solar panels on the roof
  • Goal Zero Yeti 400 storing the generated power
  • One Ikea twin foam mattress in the back
  • 10 or so miniature Rubber maids for storing most of our things
  • Finally, a big Thule roofbox to store our less used things

The front of the Wanagon, notice the super sleek solar panels. We hadn't put the roof box on by this point.
Generating power and charging things, with solar!
Our super plush bedroom.

Kyle Swanson
